intro.line1: We are a boutique real estate agency on the Costa del Sol.
intro.line2: Our mission is not just to find a property, but to discover a place that reflects your lifestyle and fulfills your dreams.

approach.title: Our Approach: “I listen before I offer”
approach.desc1: At iHome, we believe every client is unique. That’s why we begin with listening — to your story, your dreams, your family’s needs, and your lifestyle.
approach.desc2: With over 10 years of experience in real estate, we know it’s not about square meters, but about life moments that truly matter.

team.title: Meet our team
team.subtitle: Behind every successful relocation stands a dedicated professional who loves what they do.

members.name: Julia Ivanova
members.bio: Over 15 years on the Costa del Sol, Julia helps families settle with comfort. She knows every school, clinic, and neighborhood detail.

members.name: Alexey Petrov
members.bio: Alexey specializes in property investments. His expertise ensures your purchase brings not only a home but also a profitable asset.

members.name: Elena Sidorova
members.bio: Elena works with families and second-home seekers. She carefully selects homes that combine lifestyle, comfort, and long-term value.
